entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -40.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 03:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -40.1°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -44.0°C
Wind: E 12 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 38 by morning. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:15 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:15 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:15 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32. Forecast issued 10:15 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 34. Forecast issued 10:15 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
